data.replyText: If there are not enough funds in your eWallet for a deduction, the payment will be marked as pending. Your eWallet payment function will be temporarily suspended until you settle the outstanding amount. When you reload your eWallet, the pending amount will be automatically deducted from your balance, and your payment function will be reactivated.

data.replyText: PayDirect is a feature that allows you to link your physical Touch 'n Go card to your Touch ‘n Go eWallet account. If you tap your card at a PayDirect-supported terminal, the charges will be deducted from your eWallet instead of your physical card. If the eWallet does not have sufficient funds, fares will be deducted from the Touch ‘n Go card.

data.replyText:
Hi there, for better user experience, please ensure the following when taking ID photo:


1) avoid using flash

2) ensure good lighting without reflection

3) hold the phone parallel to the document

4) capture the physical document and not from photocopy document

5) avoid a 'noisy', cluttered background.

data.replyText:
Kindly proceed with the troubleshooting steps:

1) Update your time setting on your phone as automatic
2) Uninstall and re-install App
3) Go to Settings > Apps Setting > Choose ‘TNG eWallet’ from the list of Apps > Click ‘Force Stop’ > Clear Cache/Data/Storage > ‘Allow’ all permission
4) Logout and re-Login App.

data.text: Hello TnG eWallet, can you please make a new feature which somehow will make all notifications or messages to be read all at once. Simply put, a feature called "Marks all as read". It'll surely be such a convinient feature instead of making us click them all one by one which is time consuming. I hope you can consider about it. Thank you.
data.replyText: Hi Mystogan, we would like to inform you that the features you mentioned are already available in our app. Simply open your inbox and locate the 'Pen' icon at the top right corner of your screen. After clicking on it, navigate to the bottom left corner and select 'All', then choose 'Mark as read'. I hope you find this information useful.

data.text: Horrible top up experience. Have to uninstall and reinstall each time to top up. Customer service is not technically sound. Problem existed for more than a month and is still not solved. Apps layout is not good, prone to wrong press because of the auto open or close screen when key in password.
data.replyText: We understand how annoying that must be. We are always looking to improve our user experience and really appreciate the feedback.

data.text: Waiting time for customer service is very high. even after spending about 30 minutes my issue unresolved. App has issues. duitnow still not activated after install, reinstall, update, clear catche and all instructions sent by customer service. Adding credit card was also an issue, thankfully it works after reinstall.
data.replyText: We're sorry for the inconvenience. The reason could be that we are currently experiencing high volume of calls at the moment. Alternatively, you can also submit your issues or enquiry to tngd.my/careline-webform so we can assist you further.

data.text: A pretty solid ewallet. It offers a friendly UI and had a very convenient payment process. Although the face scan are super annoying as not all the time we are making purchases while being near a light source. Although it lagged behind it competitors from the rewards side, it still a fine and great ewallet to considered
data.replyText: Your feedback on the matter is greatly appreciated and we ensure you that TNGD, together with our partners will continuously find ways to improve the services to our valued customers.

data.text: I'm disappointed because this app cannot be used to top up my Touch n Go card. after all this is a TnG e wallet so it's only fitting for the user to be able to top up their TnGo card via the app also. I hope this feature will be added as soon as possible as this would be so convienient in many ways.

It CAN be a very useful App but it is currently very poorly managed. 1. Parking function often goes offline, so I installed alternative, e.g., Smart Selangor App instead for public parking. 2. Their campaign spiel in the App when I wanted to purchase the TNG card reads (because my card is expiring very very soon) - " having the enhanced TNG card available to meet our customer demand is TNG's topmost priority" and guess what. OUT OF STOCK!! for more than a month now. TOP Priority?? HaHaHa
data.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to the overwhelming demand, it is currently out of stock. But don't worry, simply register your interest via the Touch n'Go eWallet app, walk-in to our Bangsar South & Nu Sentral hubs or through our authorized distributors listed in the link https://www.touchngo.com.my/consumer/toll/card/enhance-card-outlet/

data.text: This e-wallet app is great. Easy to use for purchasing. Maybe more rewards program could be introduce. Hope that more tolls adopt paydirect features esp. close system tolls such as PLUS. I know that reload into card not possible due to fact that balance reside in the card and reader is needed for the reload and not possible to use any NFC reader due to security reason, maybe tngo could introduce autoreload card with 0 charges using e-wallet as a medium instead of credit cards with fees.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for your feedback on this and your interest to use our eWallet. We're definitely looking into how we can further expand our eWallet and our features to more services in the coming future, be rest assured that this is on our list as well. Do follow our page for more coming updates on this yea?

data.text: At the beginning it was a great app but now there is alot of problem.. The app seems to be crashed. I can't perform any transaction and now I can't even check the balance. The worst part is I tried to log out and log in but it keep on loading and I can't login at all. This is really frustrating.
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry this happened to you. Please try to uninstall & re-install your app again and see if it works. If it doesn't, please provide the following details to facilitate our investigation to tngd.my/careline-webform 1) Screenshot of error message (if any). 2) Phone model. 3) App version. 4) Android / iOS version.

data.text: Super handy E-wallet in Malaysia. Albeit, would like to have a feature on the smartphone with NFC act as a touch n go card - slowly moving away from using physical cards. That way, users can constantly top up via smartphone and promote the use of their phones to pay the toll barrier / parking lots instead of using physical cards. Lesser cards = lesser hassle.
data.replyText: Hey there, thank you for providing your valuable feedback. Your comments regarding the matter have been noted. Rest assured, we are constantly improving on our eWallet and we hope to make your eWallet experience better. Please follow our Facebook page to keep yourself updated with all our new features and promotions.

data.text: There needs to be an option to change theming colours within the app itself, i.e dark mode/light mode etc. Either that, or a warning regarding unintended interactions with app and system's theme. Had some trouble getting my QR/Barcode scanned recently due to dark mode being enabled on my phone, which caused the entire TNG app to be in black/blue instead of white/blue. Only managed to resolve it after some troubleshooting and restricting the app from using the system's dark mode.
data.replyText: Hey there, thank you for providing your valuable feedback. Your comments regarding the matter have been noted. Rest assured, we are constantly improving on our eWallet and we hope to make your eWallet experience better.

data.text: Cannot reload balance is the killer of this apps. People just want to reload the touch and Go card effortlessly, just like we used to reload our prepaid mobile last time. The wallet feature is not useful. Other apps can do much better than this. Disappointed of Touch n Go service, as always.

There are 2 main concern that actually what customer really want that this app cannot tackle. Which are:- - RELOAD Touch and Go card by using this app. This is one of most crucial your customers hope for.. instead of going to 'Tambah Nilai' lane, petrol station, etc., what they actually want is to able to top up using this app. This feature is not available in this app. - Able to read REAL TIME Touch and Go card balance. Not all of your customers able to remember their card balance especially the person who using this card for daily basis (travel by car, train, grab driver, taxi and so on) Your invention for this app is really good. But that is for future invention. And for the customers, they feel you invention is only add on for them to use for now. What's the point of this app that you have great invention but cannot solve what your customers really want. Solve this issue first then your app will be one of the most important app for every person who have Touch and Go card which i think almost all person in Malaysia have Touch and Go card.

Always have to agree with enable quick cash in (GO+). Whenever I want to cash in to my GO+, I must tick this check box where they enable quick cash in. I hate it because I want to split my money! It always ended up cashing in all my money when I never wanted to. It's very troublesome and please add this feature to permanently not enable quick cash in!
data.replyText: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please follow this simple steps to disable the function: 1) Open Touch 'n Go eWallet 2) Click "GO+" 3) Click the '3 dots' on top right corner of your screen 4) Choose "Settings" and swipe left to disable the "Quick Cash in" function.

data.text: Tried to withdraw money from GO+, been trying since the morning of 3 days ago. Tried to contact them via phone number, wasn't useful. Emails have been passed around various email addresses. Getting annoyed, not being able to speak to someone from Touch 'n Go about this. Edit: After sending emails to 4 different addresses (all were from touch 'n go) and a 2star review here. I got my money back, note that I had to wait more than 2 business days for withdrawal (request was made on 9.47am)
data.replyText: Hi, the money will be transferred within 1 BUSINESS DAY from your transaction date if the request is made before 4:00 PM. If the request is made at or after 4:00 PM, it will be treated as a next day request and the money will be transferred within 2 BUSINESS DAY. If it doesn’t, do drop us a line at tngd.my/careline-webform

data.text: Slow to open. The recent update seems to slow down the speed of launching this app. Used to be quite responsive, but now will go into black screen a few seconds before opening the app, makes you think that internet is having problem causing the app to hang.
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry this happened to you. Please try to uninstall & re-install your app again and see if it works. If it doesn't, do provide the following details to facilitate our investigation to tngd.my/careline-webform 1) Screenshot of error message (if any) 2) Phone model 3) App version 4) Android/iOS version.

data.text: Only a retard will provide an e-wallet account that is separate from card balance. Also perfect example of monoplies causing inefficiencies. Wallet can only be used on certain tolls, NOT even LRT or MRT. Edit: Really like the Go+ feature and the availability to withdraw my funds. Good job TnG (+1 star for this) but please work on integrating your online and offline balance.
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry for your experience. However, reload Touch 'n Go card is not possible at the moment because Touch 'n Go card is a smartcard with MIFARE chip which requires a card reader to enable transaction. Rest assured we are working to expand Paydirect and RFID feature to all highway in Malaysia. We appreciate your patience.

data.text: When I first time use it, the progress was going through smoothly. But then, I use it again which is just now to buy a top up for my mobile acc. I've never received the credit while the money already deducted. I contacted the number that was given if the credit didn't received after 30 mins. But guess what? The call ended. I tried many times but it was futile. What am I going to do? Uninstall. Done.
data.replyText: We are currently experiencing a high influx of reload requests. Please be informed that your reload is currently being processed. Your prepaid reload will be credited into your account within 2 working days. If the amount has not been credited after that, please send us by your mobile and ID number to tngewalletcs@tngdigital.com.my. Thank you.

data.text: too many push notifications with no way to turn off marketing/promotion related ones because there's only a single category. Rewards are very limited so the only incentive is easier toll payments. Update: 1 star until something really changes. Concrete timeline for improvements would be the best promise we can get here :)
data.replyText: We apologize if you are having an unsatisfactory experience while using our eWallet. Rest assured, we will continue to improve our eWallet and hope to make your eWallet experience better in the future, thank you.

data.text: Unable to use Pay since last update. Kept loading and eventually showed Something Went Wrong. Showed Refresh button where I could not tap. Tried to call customer service but could not match the right subject from the auto reply system. Then moved to write in and again replied by auto reply. The system closed my case right after they sent an email reply without ensuring my issue was resolved. Followed all the steps suggested in email and lastly Uninstall and Install worked the magic! Good luck!
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry this happened to you. Please try to uninstall & re-install your app with the latest version again and see if it works. If it doesn't, please submit your concerns to tngd.my/careline-webform so we can investigate and assist you furthers to resolve the issue.

data.text: I was able to screenshot the toll and parking transactions as a receipt to reclaim the charges, now that it doesn't allow to screenshot the transactions, sucks big time the only way to get the receipt is to email the transactions, which makes it complex and waste of time. Taking screenshots works way easier and simpler than this.
data.replyText: Hi, the issue has been rectified, please proceed to kill app & relaunch. Thanking in advance for your continuous support!

data.text: For me, An app that has no real value, for now. Indah khabar. Once you passed a toll, it shows how much you just paid. It will never auto top up your touch n go card. Silly app. Uninstalling soon. Sucking money by auto debit, itu hebat. Customers wish is simple: when the Smart tag touch N go balance is low, the app should automatically top it up. That is all there is to it. If you dont have the technology or capability, just say so.
data.replyText: Hi there, the TNG card is a Smartcard with a MIFARE chip, this means transactions can only take place upon contact with a card reader. However, we have introduce an alternative solution with PayDirect. Add your TNG Card into eWallet, and the toll fares will be deducted directly from your eWallet! Visit tngd.my/paydirect.

data.text: It had been a really convenient app before, but lately I've been experiencing problems with the QR barcode whenever I want to pay. It takes a very, very long time to load and for the past week the QR doesn't even pop up at all after loading for some time. Hope that this gets fixed soon :(
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry this happened to you. Please try to uninstall & re-install your app again and see if it works. If it doesn't, please submit your concerns to tngd.my/careline-webform so we can investigate and assist you furthers to resolve the issue.

data.text: Brilliant for daily shopping but the worse payment method for tolls because some toll operator does not support the eWallet and you hardly knew which one support it and which doesn't. To be on a safer side, simply reload both the eWallet and the physical card, a major inconvenience for a person who needs to drive on a daily basis and couldn't care less which payment method works on which tolls... Totally love the new NFC card, super convinient to have!
data.replyText: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we ensure you that TNGD, together with our partners will continuously working on expanding the PayDirect and RFID feature to all highways in Malaysia. Do follow our Facebook Page to get yourself updated on the participating highways. For the time being, do continue enjoying our features in the eWallet.

data.text: Overall it's easy to use. However, I was stumped at id verification because it need us to take a picture of our IC card but the camera for my phone is super blurry so I always ended up getting rejected on verification (took a whole 4 hrs trying everything to try and get a non-blurry picture before I give up). I would suggest to include camera setting for the verification system so we can adjust the camera and allowing ppl with horrible rear camera to get a better picture for id verification.
data.replyText:
Hi there, for better user experience, please ensure the following when taking ID photo:
1) avoid using flash
2) ensure good lighting without reflection
3) hold the phone parallel to the document
4) capture the physical document and not from photocopy document
5) avoid a 'noisy', cluttered background.

data.text: The main problem with the app is that the reload is not reliable. I've been trying to reload the wallet with credit cards and bank but all seems to be reporting error or even failed to load the page. This will be the main bottleneck if the app is intended to be daily use.

the apps is ok but the prepaid reload service got to be improved, eg. hotlink dont have RM 60 reload, therefore i needed to reload RM 30 twice, but the apps wouldn't allow user to reload the same number again in 3 to 4 hours, which was very troublesome. And it would be nice to use ewallet to reload touch n go cards! y i can check balance but cannot reload it here? i just don't understand...

Horrible. It's not the kind of app to top up the TnG card directly, and it messed up the balance in the card - a huge chunk of it mysteriously vanished upon registering it (and then used at tolls). Recent transactions were not updated immediately either, so no way to get reimbursed as well.

data.text: App Is User Friendly & Reliable, one set back to it : passing thru tolls & Reloaded @ TnG ewallet just before moving. data.text: Please mark the app as in beta stage. Actually, it isn't even ready for beta test. Basic functionality is there and somewhat works. You can add card, reload etc. User experience is totally down the drain. If I am not using the few stations listed, I don't see any reason of even downloading this app. For other features like buying movie and flight tickets, I think it is secondary. At this stage, I would expect it to allow it to be a unified touch and go app. Not an independent wallet to put in money. We are not ready for this for at least a few more years. It felt like the company is trying to get more consumer cash to fund their things. This is totally unethical. Your CTO and CIO really need to learn to look from consumers' perspective. Also, this is a phone app. Why do I need to login every time I launch the app? Could you not implement fingerprint scan if available? Ridiculous!

There is a problem regarding the Alipay page. Its constantly said that its server its busy. This problem is occuring throught the day. Edited 3/5: The problem can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. However the problem will still occur from time to time. Edited 9/5: There is an unexpected problem regarding some of the rewards on Alipay that state that it is sold out on when it proceded to the payment page. Perhaps it needed to state that it is sold out on the front page itself.

data.text: OVERATED APPLICATION in overall. TNG app CANNOT RELOAD TNG CARD. Don't understand the logic behind it. Further more, the other feature of the apps includes:- 1. Pay - using qr code scan which not much merchant accept 2. Transfer - only allow if the account tie to a credit or debit card. It doesn't allow transfer of money without tie up despite there is credit in the wallet. 3. Prepaid and Postpaid - which can be done using normal internet banking rather than ewallet 4. Bill payment - only allows astro for the moment 5. Cinema ticket - only mbo is available. 6. Flight - no comment. Frankly speaking, I'm currently using bigpay and it is so much more convinient to use as compared to this ewallet. It allows login using pin or fingerprint rather than key in phone number n 6 digit PIN in theTNG app. A lot more to be improve and still, my main disappointment is the inability to even cater its own core business (top up touch n go).

Love what you've done with the app in term of the functionality. Everything works great at the time being. I have one suggestion on how you guys could increase the overall user experience. It would be soo great if you could create a widget just to show E-wallet balance. I found myself hectically open the apps in rush just to look at the E-walllet balance before running through the RFID lane or going for the Pay Direct. E-wallet balance widget. Good job to the team for creating a good apps.

data.text: For the e-wallet part, I rate it 5 stars. But just to bring attention to the badly implemented new feature of investing via GO+, I'm giving it 1 star. Reason : Principal Asset Management Bhd, the party handling GO+ investment, is shortchanging / cheating investors. For daily earnings of less than 1 sen, the earnings are calculated down to 4 decimal points, and accumulated till it reaches 1 sen & credited to the investor. But for earnings above 1 sen but less than 2 sen, Principal conveniently removes the 4 decimal point calculation method, and rounds down, every day, any amount greater than 1 sen but less than 2 sen. So, if you're earning 1.9 sen everyday for 10 days, you'll only be credited 1 sen per day for 10 days, or a total of 10 sen, instead of 1.9 x 10 = 19 sen. So, they can promise u a certain percentage in returns, yet don't really need to give you the full amount promised. And in allowing this to happen, TnG & CIMB are also equally guilty of cheating consumers.
data.replyText: GO+ is a new product where users are able to earn interest from their eWallet balance that’s in the GO+ account, and should not be compared to other investments in the capital market due to its liquidity and seamless usage capabilities the other investment instruments does not have. For more clarification do email to service@principal.com.my

data.replyText:
We highly regret the inconvenience, for better user experience, please ensure the following when taking ID photo:

1) avoid using flash
2) ensure good lighting without reflection
3) hold the phone parallel to the document
4) capture the physical document and not from photocopy document
5) avoid a 'noisy', cluttered background.

data.text: People bashing this app too much and too soon. Guys, what you don't realise is the whole point of this app is to facilitate the transition to RFID. For those who won't be switching over to RFID right away, reloading your card would be your main priority and maybe the developers could add that in in future but I doubt that they will as the RFID will replace all tng as it is outdated. For the developers, I give an average rating as I'd like to see how this app works with the RFID implementation next January.

data.text: Downloaded this app to expect using my phone as token for paying LRT. While the function is there (still under beta), the inability to integrate the TNG card balance with the app's function is such a fatal mistakes. Some cards such as student card has a privilege of 50% price discount for LRT fares, or the RM 100 monthly fees, using this app means we have to forfeit the privilege, cause this app has its own credit to charge the fees. Edit: To staff that replied to this, I appreciate you taking your time reading my review. I understand the difficulty faced for merging TNG with the app, I feel that if it is possible it will be best quality of life changes this app could possible bring, and I don't mind waiting for years until this feature is possible. Other than that, the core features of the app (cashless transaction) is a positive from me, but not widely accessible at the moment, but I'm sure it's matter of time. Do keep it up with the hardworking.
